tweet verb
(BIRD)
[ I ] When a bird tweets, it makes a short, high sound: We could hear the baby birds tweeting.

tweet verb
(SOCIAL MEDIA)
[ I or T ] to publish a short remark or piece of information on Twitter: He tweeted that he was just about to meet the president.

Add to word list
a message put on Twitter to let people know what you are doing, thinking, feeling, etc.: The programme received over 20,000 tweets on the issue.
to communicate on Twitter using quick short messages: Many famous people tweet regularly. tweeter noun [ C ]
Tweeters vented their anger about the drastic cuts in public spending.
